segments.text: It smells like an ashtray in here !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi honey ! What ’ s wrong ? Why do you have that look on your face ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What ’ s wrong ? I thought we agreed that you were gonna quit smoking .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No ! I said I was going to cut down which is very different . You can ’ t just expect me to go cold turkey overnight !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Look , there are other ways to quit . You can try the nicotine patch , or nicotine chewing gum . We spend a fortune on cigarettes every month and now laws are cracking down and not allowing smoking in any public place . It ’ s not like you can just light up like before .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know , I know . I am really trying , but I don ’ t have the willpower to just quit . I can ’ t fight with the urge to reach for my pack of smokes in the morning with coffee or after lunch ! Please understand ?
segments.speaker: S2
